description: Create, update and remove port forwarding rules.

domain.description: Domain the C(vm) is related to.

protocol.description: Protocol of the port forwarding rule.

vm.description: Name of virtual machine which we make the port forwarding rule for.

private_port.description: Start private port for this rule.

poll_async.description: Poll async jobs until job has finished.

api_url.description: URL of the CloudStack API e.g. https://cloud.example.com/client/api.

zone.description: Name of the zone in which the virtual machine is in.

public_port.description: Start public port for this rule.

public_end_port.description: End public port for this rule.

state.description: State of the port forwarding rule.

api_key.description: API key of the CloudStack API.

vm_guest_ip.description: VM guest NIC secondary IP address for the port forwarding rule.

tags.description: List of tags. Tags are a list of dictionaries having keys C(key) and C(value).

api_secret.description: Secret key of the CloudStack API.

private_end_port.description: End private port for this rule.

ip_address.description: Public IP address the rule is assigned to.

account.description: Account the C(vm) is related to.

open_firewall.description: Whether the firewall rule for public port should be created, while creating the new rule.

api_region.description: Name of the ini section in the C(cloustack.ini) file.

project.description: Name of the project the C(vm) is located in.
